thread.title: Australian woman calls for airlines to improve disabled access
thread.title_full: Australian woman calls for airlines to improve disabled access

title: Australian woman calls for airlines to improve disabled access
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Australian woman calls for airlines t... Australian woman calls for airlines to improve disabled access Next Story Prev Story 4 hrs ago Read more: ABC News 
MARK COLVIN: A lot of Australians take overseas travel almost for granted, but if you are disabled, there's a lot more to worry about. Airlines make a public relations point of being disabled-friendly, but sometimes the reality may not live up to the ads. Start the conversation, or Read more at ABC News.
